Mustex: Until we find a team to join up with sure we could use all the 
help we can get until we can find some allies. Common' you can ride my 
cycle.

They climb onto their cycles and take off.

OOC: My original plan was to have them join the Autobots.  But since 
you're asking about joining my team and Hugars metioned it in private 
e-mail I might just form one. I just wouldn't like it to be run by one 
guy like the Mutants (no offence Cyberwolf you have your style I have 
mine).
